meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1723.

td.p: Chris Pietrandrea, a housewife originally from Koppel, Pennsylvania
Holly Zook, a homemaker from San Antonio, Texas
Santina Lonergan, a secondary teacher from Scranton, Pennsylvania

tr.td: SHIPS
THE GIRL SCOUTS
CELEBRITY BOOKS
ZOOLOGY
MEN'S FASHIONS
COMMON BONDS
